body_html:
I had resolved this after a week of research by modifying links of cudnn
I had installed cudnn at the same folder as cuda toolkit but I had to run ldconfig tool for the folder and all the libraries to be added to system linker path. when I had ldconfig it had complained about cudnn libs. apparently cudnn installs 3 libraries. what you want is to keep the latest library cudnn.so.major.minor version and have the cudnn.so to point to cudnn.so.major.minor.
this resolved the compilation issue.
also tensorflow requires latest protobuf so make sure to install that using pip or condo-forge
